title: Scaraboid
description:
Green glazed faience scaraboid. The scaraboid is of oval form, pierced for suspension. The faience is of coarse texture with a glaze of poor quality. The base is stamped with a name or symbol at present undecipherable. In common with the other pieces from this foundation deposit, the quality of the object is poor. 
Condition: Entire surface somewhat worn.
credit_line: Gift of the Egypt Exploration Society

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
